profile.name: file
profile.desc: Digital content. This record describes an actual file containing a digital representation of some object (image, text file, sound file, whatever).
profile.field: The MIME type of this file.
The MD5 hex digest for this file.

The intended use of this file. If derivatives can be made for content delivery, a value of "master" should be used. "access" means the file is intended for direct download. Use "preview" if this is a precomputed thumbnail or other preview image. There should be a maximum of one "master" and one "preview" belonging to a given parent (though neither are required).
